property.name: commodity
property.label: Commodity
property.description: Selected commodity for the current process

property.name: recordId
property.label: Record Id
property.description: Record Id of the parent Object

property.name: object
property.label: Object
property.description: The parent Object of the Reading

property.name: nextLabel
property.label: Next Label
property.description: The Label of the Next Button

property.name: nextVariant
property.label: Next variant
property.description: The variant of the next button

property.name: isVolture
property.label: Is Volture?
property.description: Discriminates if the process is a Volture

property.name: isDraft
property.label: Is Draft?
property.description: Discriminates if the case is in Draft

property.name: showBackButton
property.label: Show Back Button?
property.description: Whether to show the Back Button

property.name: showCancelButton
property.label: Show Cancel Button?
property.description: Whether to show the Cancel Button

property.name: cancelCase
property.label: Cancel Case?
property.description: If true call the cancellation flow

property.name: readingCustomerDate
property.label: Reading Customer Date
property.description: Date of reading provided by customer

property.name: disabledReadingDate
property.label: Disabled Reading Date
property.description: If true reading date is disabled
